channel.title: Youtube
channel.description:
Is it just me or has Youtube gotten stricter?
Nowdays, alot of videos are being deleted for the following reasons: -Fake videos(Rick Rolls). -Copyrighted non-profitable music videos. -Back music to videos(EG if you watch some form of sports skateboarding or that shit)
Discuss.
Also, if theres anymore to add to the list please post and i will add.

item.title: Youtube
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“yakman, post:41, topic:257794”][quote author=io9 link=topic=340291.msg2739614#msg2739614 date=1239240397]

What? Are they forcing you to use their service? No, therefore it’s not communism.

Communism never forces you to be a communist.

I sorta meant that as, “are there no other options?”
[/quote]

i suppose you think you can do whatever you want under capitalism.

theres no options there either

you work, or you starve to death.[/quote]

Or steal…

Read full topic

item.title: Youtube
item.dc:creator: @Square Square
item.description:
@Square wrote:

[quote=“cooper, post:43, topic:257794”][quote author=Square link=topic=340291.msg2740114#msg2740114 date=1239307954]

Heh, you guys hear about them chargng you to download their videos?
[/quote]Either way, you can just buy a converter to get the url and turn it into a video file.

But I agree, I have noticed them getting strict on the audio part. One of my favorite skate videos (the only one, it was a demo clip) was extracted its audio because of copyright.

Why buy? There are many free.[/quote]I really have no idea why I said buy. I meant download, because that application is totaly free.

Read full topic

@Cruzer wrote:

Creme de la Creme:

Someone should make a new video site and bury the servers under the sea so they can’t be stopped by copyright shits

almost had me there 2/10

item.title: Youtube
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

The music video blocking is pissing me off so much now, I have to go to dailymotion if i want to see a music video… and they don’t have many there. Fucks me off so much.

Read full topic

item.title: Youtube
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“dragonfire455, post:35, topic:257794”][quote author=primadude link=topic=340291.msg2739451#msg2739451 date=1239233608]

[quote author=dragonfire455 link=topic=340291.msg2739439#msg2739439 date=1239233093]

[quote author=primadude link=topic=340291.msg2739433#msg2739433 date=1239232947]

YouTube is also blocking all premium music clips after failing to agree a new deal with the Performing Right Society (PRS) to pay royalties.

Read the below link for more info, I cba to c & p it here.

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/entertainment/7942045.stm

[/quote]Are you fuckin’ kidding me? That’s absolute bullshit

I know. Most of the videos of the artists I like are blocked for me now.
[/quote]What I find ironic is that YouTube is always blabbing on how you should “express yourself” on there, and yet they continuously delete music from a famous artist that you wish to share with others.

Just fucking peachy.

It’s kind of hypocritical in a way.
[/quote]More than hypocritical, it’s communism.[/quote]
You’re 100% wrong.

io9:

What? Are they forcing you to use their service? No, therefore it’s not communism.

Communism never forces you to be a communist.

[quote=“dragonfire455, post:37, topic:257794”][quote author=io9 link=topic=340291.msg2739506#msg2739506 date=1239235045]
What? Are they forcing you to use their service? No, therefore it’s not communism.
[/quote]I didn’t mean it like that, I meant it as in evil as communism in my opinion and outlook on it.[/quote]
How is communism evil?

Read full topic

item.title: Youtube
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

[quote=“primadude, post:34, topic:257794”][quote author=dragonfire455 link=topic=340291.msg2739439#msg2739439 date=1239233093]

[quote author=primadude link=topic=340291.msg2739433#msg2739433 date=1239232947]

YouTube is also blocking all premium music clips after failing to agree a new deal with the Performing Right Society (PRS) to pay royalties.

Read the below link for more info, I cba to c & p it here.

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/entertainment/7942045.stm

[/quote]Are you fuckin’ kidding me? That’s absolute bullshit

I know. Most of the videos of the artists I like are blocked for me now.
[/quote]What I find ironic is that YouTube is always blabbing on how you should “express yourself” on there, and yet they continuously delete music from a famous artist that you wish to share with others.

Just fucking peachy.

It’s kind of hypocritical in a way.[/quote]More than hypocritical, it’s communism.

Read full topic

item.title: Youtube
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:26, topic:257794”][quote author=bowserjr2 link=topic=340291.msg2719935#msg2719935 date=1237918352]
That and “This movie is not available in your country” is annoying.

I wonder, do artists really support these retarded copyright folks?

Sadly someone, and some support TPB.
[/quote]

Yea, but do they really support them? Isn’t it just to stay out of problems with their record company’s?[/quote]
Like some most in the record companies there is artists that also think suing people is the best way to earn money and be popular.
So yes some support them, not all is using their brain when they think.
